#

d, t, s = map(int, input().split())

if d/s <= t:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

a = int(input())
b = int(input())
print(a*b)


d, t, s = map(int, input().split())

if d/s <= t: 
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')


d, t, s = map(float, input().split())

if d/s <= t:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

(D, T, S) = map(int, input().split())

if D / S <= T:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

(D, T, S) = map(int, input().split())

if D / (T - S) <= T:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

(D, T, S) = map(int, input().split())

if D / S <= T:  # 到達できるかどうか
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

(D, T, S) = map(int, input().split())

if D / S <= T:  # 到達可能かどうか
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

d, t, s = map(int, input().split())

if d/s <= t:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
d, t, s = map(int, input().split())
print('Yes' if d <= t * s else 'No')
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

d, t, s = map(int, input().split())
print('Yes' if d <= t * s else 'No')
(D, T, S) = map(int, input().split())

if D / S <= T:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')
